transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello, haan ji sir. 
Customer: Sune baat kar raha hu sir India Mart se.
Executive: Haan sir. Ji sir, refund aa gaya kya sir aapko?
Customer: Nahi, nahi aaya tha.
Executive: Refund to refund aa gaya hoga sir aapko.
Customer: Nahi aaya.
Executive: Haan check kiya aapne? Dono account check kariye jitna bhi company account hai sara.
Customer: Haan company account mein to check kar liya.
Executive: Achha. Sir ek order ID bhi aaya hua tha aapko mail pe bhi aaya hoga na ek order ID aaya hoga reference ID.
Customer: Haan mail pe to aaya to tha reference ID.
Executive: Haan to sir usse hi to aap apne bank se puch sakte hai na sir maximum to I can do this. Maine aapko formally sab kuch aapko check kara diya sir. Ab bank ke aane jaane mein thoda sa time lagta hai sir aapko bhi pata hoga. Gateway and wo sab mein.
Customer: Order ID order ID aapke end se invoice ek aaya hua hai.
Executive: Sorry?
Customer: Order ID 8995460.
Executive: One one minute dekh leta hu.
Customer: Ji ji ji.
Executive: Customer care your refund of itna four to five days order ID to isme nahi hai. Refund 14755 has been initiated for your IndiaMART this is service the refunded amount will reflect in your account within four to five working days. Ye three days echo aaya hai yaani ki 19 tarikh mein aaya hai. Lekin isme order ek order ID hai your refund itna initiated 21 tarikh ko aaya hua hai. 22 22 23 chutti ho gaya correct to us din ka to hua nahi ab kal pehla working day tha aaj dusra working day hai. By Friday it will reflect into your account might max.
Customer: Four to five jo hai Friday aapko reflect kar jayega aapke account mein. 21 tarikh ko aaya hai ek aaya hai 21 tarikh ko aur aaya hai 25 to 22 aur 23 Friday ke din aaya 21 ko ek order ID. Theek hai?
Executive: 21 ko aaya Friday ko. 
Customer: To 22 23 holiday tha. Aur 24 25 do din abhi do din aur. Gmail ID open kar Gmail ID free industry ke naam se Gmail ID. 4 to 5 working days abhi nahi aaya. Kya ho gaya sir?
Executive: Hello.
Customer: Haan ji bataiye. Process ka link jo hai na wo free nahi aaya sir.
Executive: Haan sir aa jayega main wahi aapko bata raha hu aa jayega na wahi to main aapko mail dikha raha hu ki mail chala gaya. Subah mein phone phone aaya tha na isi wajah se. Haan isi cheez ke liye aaya tha just main puchna chahta tha sir kya confirm ho jaye tab tak humne dekha ki hamare mail bhi chala gaya account se reference ID bhi aapko de diya gaya is cheez ke liye. Wahi main bas confirm karke aapko dikhana chahta tha details mein sara information. Isiliye call kiya tha.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai? Sara information diya hua hai sir as it is. Iske alawa bhi main constant touch mein rahunga sir aapke call se aap call kar lena mujhe koi problem aata hai to.
Customer: Theek hai. Theek hai okay.
Executive: Theek hai sir thank you sir and agar aap future mein sir isko theek kar sakte hai please reach out to me sir whenever you want. 
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai. Kya kya bol rahe the?
Customer: Main bol raha hu sir in future agar aapka problem ye sort ho jaye aur aap IndiaMART se dobara judna chahe future mein to please contact me sir.
Executive: Okay okay don't worry. Hum logo ka problem theek ho gaya hum aapko contact karenge theek hai. Sure sir sure thank you sir. Abhi ke liye main ye wala concern close kar dunga sir theek hai?
Customer: Theek hai theek hai.
Executive: Done sir thank you sir.
Customer: Okay thank you.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer has not received the refund yet.

- Enquired about the process link.



Resolution:

- Executive confirmed refund initiated and shared details.

- Explained the delay due to holidays.

- Assured the customer that refund will reflect soon.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will remain in contact for any issues.



Alert (If Any):

refund

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- refund, order id, bank, holidays
